prompt: make me a website where i can track calories and workout i performed in gym
refinedPrompt: Create a fitness tracking website that allows users to log their daily calorie intake and track their gym workouts. The website should include a dashboard displaying calories consumed, calories burned, and workout history. Implement features such as setting fitness goals, generating reports, and providing insights based on user data. The website should have a user-friendly interface, allowing easy input of calories and workouts, and provide a database to store user information securely.
